SELECT: CASE WHEN SUM("NUMBER_OF_EMPLOYEES") = 0 THEN 0 ELSE ROUND((SUM("NUMBER_OF_QUALIFIED_EMPLOYEES") * 100 / SUM("NUMBER_OF_EMPLOYEES")),0) END AS "QUALIFICATIONPERCENTAGE"
CASE WHEN SUM("PROFESSIONAL_COMPETENCY") = 0 THEN 0 ELSE ROUND((SUM("PROFESSIONAL_QUALIFIED_COMPETENCY") * 100 / SUM("PROFESSIONAL_COMPETENCY")),0) END AS "PROFCOMPETENCY"
CASE WHEN SUM("REGULATION_COMPETENCY") = 0 THEN 0 ELSE ROUND((SUM("REGULATION_QUALIFIED_COMPETENCY") * 100 / SUM("REGULATION_COMPETENCY")),0) END AS "REGULCOMPETENCY"
CASE WHEN SUM("TOTAL_COMPETENCY") = 0 THEN 0 ELSE ROUND((SUM("TOTAL_QUALIFIED_COMPETENCY") * 100 / SUM("TOTAL_COMPETENCY")),0) END AS "TOTALCOMPETENCY"
